item.title: SwiftData - An Introduction
item.description: Kindly be aware that the provided code snippets rely on Xcode 15 beta 6. Consequently, there is a possibility of encountering syntax inconsistencies in forthcoming beta releases. Finally, during WWDC 2023, Apple made the decision to upgrade its primary persistence framework CoreData with SwiftData. This involved adopting a more robust framework that takes advantage of the recently introduced Macros system and other advanced language features for the purpose of data modelling and management.
